name: Beat Down (arrylad)
description:
BeatDown is a rythmic inspriation of the game Downwell. Just like its predecessor the player, equip with gun shoes, falls down a well filled with bricks and enemies. The player must keep intime with the beat of the music to jump and shoot their way through anything in their path. The beat of the music is shown at the bottom of the screen so press space when the squares are in the green. 

There are clear instructions in the games menu.
